summary: Teenager Susie Q dies 1955. Jumping to 1995, Zach moves into a haunted house with his mom and kid sister. Susie Q's ghost asks Zach for help.
cast: Amy Jo Johnson|Ernie Prentice|Bentley Mitchum|Tasha Simms|Allan Morgan|Shelley Long|Justin Whalin|Andrea Libman|Garwin Sanford|Chris William Martin|Dale Wilson|Winston Brown|Sabrina Byrne|Mark Schooley|Lloyd Berry|Benjamin Ratner|Laura Harris|Kirsten Robek|Pat Waldron|David Kaye|Walter Marsh|Will Sasso|Allan Franz|John Johnston|Carolyn Spielmacher|Brian Arnold|Rebecca Toolan|Aaron Pearl|Cameron Labine
director: Director: John Blizek (as John Grant Weil)
title: Susie Q
